title: MLflow Tracking Server Model Creation Directory Traversal Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of MLflow Tracking Server. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the handling of model file paths. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied path prior to using it in file operations. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the service account.
addtionnal_details: MLflow has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://github.com/B-Step62/mlflow/commit/2e02bc7bb70df243e6eb792689d9b8eba0013161
timeline:
2025-05-29 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2025-10-03 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2025-10-03 - Advisory Updated
